divs: Sighting Detailsi was eating lunch at mc donalds in west springfield,ma. and i looked up in the sky and from where i was sitting it looked like a magic carpet floating over the river..so i took out my cell phone and snapped like 5 shots,it looked like i didn't get a pic of it,but when i brought it home and downloaded it onto my mac,there it was not 1 but 2 square shaped crafts,it sat over the water for quite some time..when i finished eating i just watched it sitting there,no lights,no noise,it was completely silent..then it slowly drifted off into the blue sky,it was my 1st day ufo sighting ever..i watched it fly far far away,it was weird cause i could c it real far away and then there was nothing.. i am an air force brat,i lived on multiple air force bases and have never seen anything like this craft,been to numerous air shows and have never seen anything like this..please let me know if u want to c the square ufo pics..thanx for your time..and this is for real..
Summary: big black square no lights just flat
trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Springfield
There were no other sightings in Springfield on or around February 1st 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
